@metadata.name: uri
@metadata.comment: This is a mixed library and object. The creator act as a library and can be fully identified by its library prefix, but the created object can not be identified unless intellisense is active.

mw.uri 001.description:
mw.uri.encode( s[, enctype] )
 s - string used as source
 enctype - encoding to use

mw.uri 002.description:
mw.uri.decode( s[, enctype] )
 s - string used as source

mw.uri 003.description:
mw.uri.anchorEncode( s )
 s - string used as source

mw.uri 005.description:
mw.uri.parseQueryString( s, i, j )
 s - string used as source

mw.uri 009.description:
mw.uri.new( s )
 s - string used as source

mw.uri 011.description:
mw.uri:parse( s )
 s - string used as source

mw.uri 013.description:
mw.uri:extend( parameters )
 parameters - table to be merged into the object's query table
